### **`Sample Request`**


`.env` file:

```dotenv
CLIENT_CA_CERT_PEM=./certs/ob-transport/ob_root_ca.cer
CLIENT_CERT_PEM=./certs/ob-transport/BZ5TXmhW1hC6NhqFVB5lURIWzsk.pem
CLIENT_KEY_PEM=./certs/ob-transport/zDcwMHjgbPP3ETGEO4tCV9.key
OB_SIGN_KEY=./certs/ob-transport/signing.key
```

localhost:8080/danske/register?ssa=eyJhbGciOiJQUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ikh6YTl2NWJnREpjT25oY1VaN0JNd2JTTF80TlYwZ1NGdklqYVNYZEMtMWM9IiwidHlwIjoiSldUIn0..Fn73bBpZdBQsBgWGfGPdnJjLIQGmzXW-IT776Nz30lqadFZi05p8Ehs6bF9lop6osVEYaLnYaaxqlmH3EhbtVybyZohfliojSrjGlm1hb88usOPy17i7X2Ps-fJZgAgWrKVQ6AM5Kd_VJkV7keTLlWD_NHnNAMedXEAP6k1JzMHJhU016uf9FpdGAszhe6C6qUxAzomRvmw8QXmHAnkFebWkXQC5gH_TYFoCbQflYGJsfFRM-OxQS2SzZ4IyvH0tCbWLCQaMumwHB-D99mCJtakh67RQfM08UoWyfwwUo5vEqcxvnXWlTmf2O5BcAvoEfrwwkGKf3vCUq5Q9vUAS0Q

"{\"error\":\"invalid_software_statement\",\"error_description\":\"Invalid Software Statement: SSA has expired, issued more than 10 mins ago - c1abe7bc-a7c0-4307-9b84-36d6677672ee.\"}"
